data.actual_result: Allows you to edit channel topic, thank god it doesn’t actually save though.
data.expected_result: Nothing really, I just found this whilst trying to find bugs.
data.short_description: Allows you to edit channel without perms and when you click save, it doesn’t  save thank god.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get on a server where you have no perms to edit channel. - As fast as you can, tap “message in (channelname)” and the top bar, the name of the channel leading you to channel settings. - May take few times to repro, you have to click the bar FIRST and then quickly the message before it transfers you. you should be able to edit channel topic.
